attributes.name: Hping Process Activity v100.0.2
attributes.description: Hping ran on a Linux host. Hping is a FOSS command-line packet analyzer and has the ability to construct network packets for a wide variety of network security testing applications, including scanning and firewall auditing.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Normal use of hping is uncommon apart from security testing and research. Use by non-security engineers is very uncommon.
attributes.query: event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and process.name:(hping or hping2 or hping3)
